passOemailInvalid: Izina cg ijambo ryibanga ntago aribyo
PleaseVerify: Banza Ushyiremo Email yawe kugirango ukomeze
log in to get access: Injira kugirango ubone uburyo bwo gukomeza
permission for this action: Ntabwo ufite uburenganzira bwo gukora iki gikorwa
role must be one of [driver, operator, a: role igomba kuba imwe muri izi [driver, operator, admin]
role must be one of [normal, driver, ope: role must be one of [normal, driver, operator, admin]
User with the provided email is already: Umukoresha hamwe na imeri yatanzwe yamaze kwiyandikisha.
Name must be atleast four characters: Izina rigomba kuba byibuze inyuguti enye
birthdate must be atleast six characters: itariki y'amavuko igomba kuba byibuze inyuguti esheshatu
date of birth must be atleast six charac: date of birth must be atleast six characters
date of birth should be in a format yyyy: itariki y'amavuko igomba kuba muburyo yyyy-mm-dd
can't add new bus: Habayemo ikibazo mu kongeramo indi bisi
can't update bus: Ikosa ryabaye mugihe cyo kuvugurura bisi
plate should be at least 7 character: puraki igomba kuba byibuze igizwe n'inyuguti zirindwi
seats should be a number: imyanya ya bisi igomba kuba umubare
seats should be integer number: imyanya ya bisi igomba kuba umubare
status should be [active, inactive]: status igomba kuba imwe muri izi: [active, inactive]
seats should be greater than or equal to: imyanya ya bisi igomba kuba hejuru cyangwa ingana na 18
category should be empty: icyiciro cya bisi ntikigomba kuba ubusa
